title: Replays and Highlights
body: Can someone tell me how a highlight is saved? Also, how do I open my replays from my replays folder on my computer? It got a weird file type which I'm sure how to open it or use it with the league client to view my replays.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You can find more information on how to use the replay system [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/client/client-features/road-pre-season-replays-horizon) and [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips).

I am still yet to use the replay tool so am unsure if you're able to open a whole replay file unless in client, however highlights are saved as .webm and therefore should be openable in any of the popular browsers/media players.
